attributes.review: you would think that the prez of the US would be able to create a halfway decent app, but I was proven wrong time and time again after installing and periodically reinstalling this app in a futile attempt to join the Soace Force. When I downloaded the app, I was sent to Mars for three seconds and Jeff Bezos was there, but before I could ask him for the 3 million dollars Iâ€™ve been emailing him about for the past two years, I was sent back to Central JerseyğŸ™„ thatâ€™s not even remotely close to Mars! I got this app so I could join the Space Force! Legit NEXT DAY, i wake up and open the app, thinking maybe Iâ€™ll be sent to a new planet for a mission that wonâ€™t glitch. Well, throw me on a set of wet concrete stairs, put me in a dank red-ass suit and call me the Joker bc this was one SAD JOKE. Not only am I NOT sent to Mars, I am asked to donate some of my OWN hard-earned money to support a political candidate. When President Trump asked me to contribute, he clearly was not looking for my moneyâ€” this nation would benefit far more from my ripped body in the Space Force than from any cash shmoney. Just when I think Iâ€™ve sucked all the sweet honeysuckle propaganda and fresh squeezed Kool Aid of this app, I fall into another trap. I try to delete it, and my acid trip completely stops. COMPLETELY. Like, no flying caterpillars, no fiery tire fires, nothing. Everything is suddenly so quiet and bright. Where did the sirens go? Where did the howling toucans fly off to? PuhlEESE do not download this app i swear to Jesus Christ in Heaven (blessed by His name) you will regret it and ğŸš¨SPOILER ALERTğŸš¨you will NOT be able to join the Space Force.
